required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Perioperative Risk Factors of Outcomes for Cardiac Surgery: A Retrospective Study
clinical_study.official_title: Perioperative Risk Factors of Outcomes for Cardiac Surgery: A Retrospective Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: Based on a review of about 10,000 patients undergoing cardiac surgery under CPB in West China Hospital of Sichuan University and the Second Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University, we try to evalute the effect of blood transfusion on outcomes in cardiac surgery.

study_pop.textblock: The patients in the west China hospital of sichuan university (July 01, 2011, solstice during June 30, 2017) and the second affiliated hospital of zhejiang university (September 01, 2013, solstice, June 30, 2017) have cardiac surgery under Cardiopulmonary bypass (CPB)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- The patients in the west China hospital of sichuan university (July 01, 2011, solstice during June 30, 2017) and the second affiliated hospital of zhejiang university (September 01, 2013, solstice, June 30, 2017) have cardiac surgery under Cardiopulmonary bypass (CPB)
Exclusion Criteria:
- No

overall_official.affiliation: The Second Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University Medical College
